title: 葱油齐助力啊！联署要求白宫调查推特侵犯言论自由事件！
contents:
地址
https://petitions.whitehouse.gov/petition/call-thorough-investigation-twitters-violation-freedom-speech


Call for a thorough investigation on Twitter's violation of freedom of speech

Created by L.C. on May 20, 2020

3,652 SIGNED100,000 GOAL

Twitter has suppressed criticisms of CCP and suspended dissent s accounts while pro-Beijing accounts live well. Recently, such censorship is taken to a new level when Dr. FeiFei Li is on Twitter's board.
On 5.18.2020, not surprisingly, many anti-CCP twitter Users found themself suspended, some permanently.
Based on public report, during 2017-2018, Dr. Li, as Google ’s chief AI scientist, had been in charge of extensive military-technical programs involved with the CCP at helm of Google AI center. After her resignation due to a scandal exposed, Dr. Li remains close ties with top leaders of the CCP.
We hereby suggest a thorough investigation on Twitter's violation of freedom of speech, and on Dr. FeiFei Li's collaborations with CCP , a threat to national security.

Twitter壓制了對中共的批評，並暫停了持不同政見者的賬戶，而親北京的賬戶卻活得很好。 最近，當李飛飛博士進入Twitter董事會時，這種審查制度被提升到了一個新的高度。
不意外地，在2020年8月15日，許多反中共的Twitter用戶發現自己已被暫停，其中一些被永久刪除。
根據公開報告，2017年至2018年期間，作為Google首席AI科學家的李博士曾在Google AI中心掌管與中共有關的廣泛軍事技術計劃。 在因醜聞而辭職後，李博士與中共最高領導人保持著密切聯繫。
我們在此建議對Twitter侵犯言論自由以及李飛飛博士與中共的合作（對國家安全構成威脅）進行徹底調查。
